Title: King David
Writer: Andrew Birkin (screenplay), James Costigan (screenplay), James Costigan (story based upon The Books of Samuel I and II Chronicles I and the Psalms of David)
Actors: Richard Gere, Edward Woodward, Alice Krige, Denis Quilley
Plot: Israel circa 1,000 B.C. The adult life of David, who would eventually become King of Israel, is presented. The blessing of the Prophets, as the voice of God, is required before the King can...
